namespace.description: Namespace of the source, such as yelpmain.db, etc

schema.description: The json formatted string of the Avro schema

source.description: Source of the Avro schema, such as table User, or log service.foo etc

category.description: The updated category of a source
The category that the specified source belongs to

source_id.description: The id of the source this category specifies

updated_at.description: When this category is last updated

created_at.description: When this consumer group is created

updated_at.description: When this consumer group is last updated

consumer_group_id.description: The id of the consumer group the data source is consumed by.

created_at.description: When this data source is initially added to the consumer group.

data_source_id.description: Id of the data source object, such as namespace id or source id.

updated_at.description: When this consumer group - data source mapping is last updated.

data_source_id.description: Id of the data source object, such as namespace id or source id.

data_source_type.description: Type of the data source. Must be one of the following values: Namespace, Source.

destination.description: Url that connects to the data target, such as the connection url to a Redshift cluster.

target_type.description: Short description of the data target type, such as Redshift.

last_updated_by.description: The email of the user who edited the note

note.description: The text of the note itself

reference_id.description: The id of the item that this note is for

reference_type.description: The type of item that this note is for ('schema', or 'schema_element')

avg_rows_per_second_cap.description: This field throttles the throughput of the refresh runner once the refresh is actually run. It will sleep in between batch row gets to limit it to this cap (default: null)

batch_size.description: Number of rows to refresh per batch.

filter_condition.description: This field contains the expression used to filter the records that must be refreshed. E.g. It may be a MySQL where clause if the source of the refresh is a MySQL table.

offset.description: Represents the last known position that has been refreshed.

priority.description: Priority of this refresh. LOW=20, MAX=100

DataTarget.description: The data target is where the messages consumed by this consumer group will be sent to.

created_at.description: When this data target is created

destination.description: Url that connects to the data target, such as Redshift cluster connection url.

target_type.description: Short description of the data target type, such as Redshift.

updated_at.description: When this data target is last updated

MetaAttributeMapping.description: Mapping of Meta Attributes to be includes for sepcific entities (Namespace, Source or AvroSchema).

meta_attribute_schema_id.description: Avro Schema ID of meta attribute.

alter_table_stmt.description: The ALTER TABLE statement from the table schema change. For the change in the existing table, both old_create_table_stmt and alter_table_stmt must be provided.

namespace.description: Namespace of the source, such as yelpmain.db, etc

new_create_table_stmt.description: The CREATE TABLE statement of a new table or the updated table.

old_create_table_stmt.description: The CREATE TABLE statement of the old table. For the change in the existing table, both old_create_table_stmt and alter_table_stmt must be provided.

source.description: Source of the Avro schema, such as table User, or log service.foo etc

Namespace.description: Namespace an avro schema belongs to

updated_at.description: When this namespace is last updated

Note.description: A user defined note for the schema element that is used in the documentation tool. Used to store any relevant information about the schema element that can be useful to reference.

last_updated_by.description: The email of the user who edited the note

note.description: The text of the note itself

reference_id.description: The id of the item that this note is for

reference_type.description: The type of item that this note is for ('schema', or 'schema_element')

updated_at.description: When this note is last updated

last_updated_by.description: The email of the user who edited the note

note.description: The text of the note itself

reference_id.description: The id of the item that this note is for

reference_type.description: The type of item that this note is for ('schema', or 'schema_element')

updated_at.description: When this note is last updated

avg_rows_per_second_cap.description: This field throttles the throughput of the refresh runner once the refresh is actually run. We will sleep in between batch row gets to limit it to this cap (default: null)

batch_size.description: Number of rows to refresh per batch.

filter_condition.description: This field contains the expression used to filter the records that must be refreshed. E.g. It may be a MySQL where clause if the source of the refresh is a MySQL table.

namespace_name.description: Name of the namespace the refresh is running on.

offset.description: Represents the last known position that has been refreshed.

priority.description: Priority of this refresh. LOW=20, MAX=100

source_name.description: Name of the source the refresh is running on.

updated_at.description: When this refresh is last updated.

RegisterMetaAttributeRequest.description: Register a mapping of sepcified meta_attributes and entity (Namespace, Source or AvroSchema).

meta_attribute_schema_id.description: AvroSchema ID of Meta Attribute schema to be mapped.

alter_table_stmt.description: The ALTER TABLE statement from the table schema change. For the change in the existing table, both old_create_table_stmt and alter_table_stmt must be provided.

contains_pii.description: Whether the schema contains PII field.

namespace.description: Namespace this Avro schema belongs to, such as yelpmain.db, etc

new_create_table_stmt.description: The CREATE TABLE statement of a new table or the updated table.

old_create_table_stmt.description: The CREATE TABLE statement of the old table. For the change in the existing table, both old_create_table_stmt and alter_table_stmt must be provided.

source.description: Source of the Avro schema, such as table User, or log service.foo etc

source_owner_email.description: Email address of the source owner

base_schema_id.description: The original Avro schema that this schema is transformed from

cluster_type.description: Type of kafka cluster this topic belongs to. See http://y/datapipe_cluster_types for more info on cluster_types.

contains_pii.description: Whether the schema contains PII field.

namespace.description: Namespace this Avro schema belongs to, such as yelpmain.db, etc

schema.description: The json formatted string of the avro schema to be registered

source.description: Source of the Avro schema, such as table User, or log service.foo etc

source_owner_email.description: Email address of the source owner

base_schema_id.description: The original Avro schema that this schema is transformed from

status.description: Schema status: RW (read/write), R (read-only), Disabled. `Read` status means this schema can be used to deserialize messages, and `Write` status means this schema can be used to serialize messages. Disabled schemas cannot be used for either.

updated_at.description: When this schema is last updated

created_at.description: When this schema element is created

element_type.description: Avro type of the element, such as record, field, etc.

key.description: Unique key to avro schema element of the enclosing avro schema

schema_id.description: Avro schema ID this element belongs to

updated_at.description: When this schema element is last updated

new_schema.description: The JSON formatted string of the avro schema to which we want to migrate

old_schema.description: The JSON formatted string of the avro schema from which we want to migrate

target_schema_type.description: The type of schema migration desired (e.g. redshift, mysql, etc.)

category.description: Category that this source belongs to

name.description: Name of the source, such as 'User' for table User.

owner_email.description: Email address of the source owner

updated_at.description: When this source is last updated

Topic.description: Topic that this schema is associated to

cluster_type.description: Type of kafka cluster this topic belongs to. See http://y/datapipe_cluster_types for more info on cluster_types.

contains_pii.description: Whether the messages in this topic contain PII.

updated_at.description: When this topic is last updated

last_updated_by.description: The email of the user who edited the note

note.description: The text of the note itself

offset.description: Represents the last known position that has been refreshed.

info.description: Schematizer is REST service to register and retrieve Avro schemas, maintain Avro schema backward compatibilities, register producer and consumer of Avro schemas, and generate redshift push plans.
info.title: Data Pipeline Schematizer

get.summary: List all the categories

post.summary: Check if given Avro schema is both backward and forward compatible with all the enabled schemas of the same topic.
Check if the Avro schema derived from the MySQL statements is compatible with all the enabled schemas of the same topic.

get.summary: List all the consumer groups.
Get the consumer group of specified ID
List the data sources associated to this consumer group.

post.summary: Add a data source to this consumer group.

get.summary: List all the data targets.
Get the data target of specified name
Get the data target of specified ID
List the consumer groups associated to this data target.

post.summary: Create a consumer group that is associated to this data target.

parameters.description: Unix timestamp the topics must be created after. The topics created at the same timestamp will be included.
parameters.name: created_after

get.summary: Get all the topics associated to this data target, and optionally filtered by topic creation time.
List all the namespaces

delete.description: The namespace name and the schema_id of Meta attribute schema should exist.

parameters.name: namespace

parameters.description: Namespace for which meta attributes will be fetched
parameters.name: namespace

parameters.name: namespace

List all the sources of specified namespace

parameters.name: note_id

parameters.description: Current status of the refresh.
parameters.name: status

parameters.name: created_after

parameters.description: Unix timestamp that the refresh was updated after. Refreshes updated at the same timestamp will be included.
parameters.name: updated_after

parameters.description: It's the epoch timestamp and limits schemas to those created at or after this timestamp.

parameters.name: count

parameters.description: Limits results to those schemas with an id greater than or equal to given min_id.

parameters.description: Set to True to include disabled schemas. Default it excludes disabled ones.
parameters.name: include_disabled

get.summary: Get the Avro schemas created after the specified created_after timestamp. Default it excludes disabled schemas.
